content:
It seems that cranelift-codegen's docs.rs documentation does not have working search. I type in something that I know for sure is in cranelift-codegen (such as verify) but the search results don't show up and neither does any kind of loading icon. Then I press enter on my keyboard and I get a page with Loading search results... and a title bar of null.

Is this the same issue as discussed here?
Big issue this is. I'll take a look in a few hours. Please open an issue and tag me on it in the meantime.
I have an idea what the issue is already. ;)
@Camelid it's because of https://github.com/rust-lang/docs.rs/issues/1305. @GuillaumeGomez it's already fixed on the docs.rs side
Ah great, thanks! Was about to check about the new crates file in docs.rs but I guess it's already done. ;)
I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/docs.rs/pull/1312 fixing the root issue, I need to debug the regression
err actually that failure seems to happen on master too so probably unrelated to my change
So would cranelift-codegen's docs need to be rebuilt to fix this?
